name: ALAS Academia Latinoamericana de Aviación Superior
about: **Academia Latinoamericana de Aviación Superior (ALAS)** is a premier flight training institution based in Panama, supported by Copa Airlines. As a non-profit academy, ALAS offers comprehensive flight programs at international standards and below industry average costs. It prepares aspiring aviators for successful careers, with a strong commitment to equal opportunities, including a significant presence of women in the industry. ALAS has graduated over 220 Panamanian pilots, many of whom now serve as first officers and captains at Copa Airlines. The academy provides financial support through scholarships and loans, ensuring accessible education for talented individuals. With a robust curriculum and direct integration into Copa Airlines, ALAS is dedicated to fostering the next generation of pilots and contributing to the social and economic development of Panama. For more information, visit alaspanama.com.
